details.title: Meet Our Experts
details.footer: We'd love to learn more about you â€” send in your application today!

members.name: Peg Legge
members.bio: Peg has over 15 years of experience in the tech industry and has led multiple successful startups. She oversees the company's strategic direction and growth initiatives.

members.name: Richard Guerra
members.bio: Richard is a technology visionary with a passion for innovation. He leads our technical team and ensures that we stay at the forefront of technological advancements.
members.education: Ph.D. in Computer Science from MIT

members.name: Alexandra Stolz
members.bio: Alexandra brings creativity and user-centered design principles to every project. She leads our design team in creating beautiful and functional user interfaces.
members.education: BFA in Graphic Design from RISD

members.name: Janet Bray
members.bio: Janet is a senior developer with expertise in frontend and backend technologies. She is passionate about writing clean, efficient code and mentoring junior developers.
members.education: BS in Computer Science from Stanford University

members.name: Michael Chen
members.bio: Michael leads our marketing efforts with a data-driven approach. He has a track record of successful campaigns that drive growth and brand awareness.
members.education: BS in Marketing from NYU Stern

members.name: Sarah Johnson
members.bio: Sarah ensures that our projects are delivered on time and within budget. She is skilled at coordinating cross-functional teams and managing complex projects.
members.education: PMP Certification, MBA from UC Berkeley
